page.title: 05THE MANOR (RUARDEAN,GLOS)
page.content: The old Manor is now just a pile of stone. It is old, hard stone. Many of the people think that it was a castle but it's not. I can see it from our garden wall. it used to be inherited by rich people. It is probably older than the church we have. The church was built in 1111. When it was new it was probably guarded by cannon each way. It's been wrecked for years now and when my Dad was a boy he used to ride up and down on his bike. The county Council want to get together and build it up to its proper state. It's very convenient having it over our wall because I can sit and sketch on the wall. All I draw is a pile of rubble. Cromwell stood on Pettycroft and fired with his cannon so he broke it down.
